title: OTEX Texture Pack
description: A high-quality texture pack for Doom mapping containing over 1500 textures and flats. Used by many modern WADs as a resource dependency. Freely available for mappers.

screenshots.caption: A screenshot of MAP21 of Eviternity, which uses OTEX

notes: [Official site](https://doom.ukiro.com/) • Resource pack for mappers, not playable standalone.
